mdRecord.dcterms:description: One graffiti scribbled out and illegible; one graffiti seems to be responding to it, with a third criticizing the second, alluding to social class. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
I hear ya | middle class guilt |
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Social status
Guilt
